verbs.description: [ARG0: A judge] [V: ordered] [ARG1: President Donald Trump] [ARG2: to sit for a seven - hour deposition by Jan. 31 , 2019 , in a defamation case brought by former ' Apprentice ' contestant Summer Zervos] .

A judge ordered [ARG1: President Donald Trump] to [V: sit] [ARGM-PRP: for a seven - hour deposition] [ARGM-TMP: by Jan. 31 , 2019 ,] [ARGM-LOC: in a defamation case brought by former ' Apprentice ' contestant Summer Zervos] .
A judge ordered President Donald Trump to sit for a seven - hour deposition by Jan. 31 , 2019 , in [ARG1: a defamation case] [V: brought] [ARG0: by former ' Apprentice ' contestant Summer Zervos] .
